properties.name: BLR/BID/18
properties.site-address: Land at Nuttaberry Works, Bideford
properties.notes: Residential capacity of site originally considered through SHLAA SHA/BID/18. Site identified as a non-strategic housing site in North Devon and Torridge Local Plan 2011-2031 (Appendix 5). Site has resolution to grant consent (1/0041/2009/OUTM) subject to signining of s106 agreement, following committee decision on 20/08/2020. Site not identified as being deliverable through the most recent published Statement of Five Year Housing Land Supply (November 2019), although considered developable in longer term.. Residential redevelopment of former commercial brownfield site comprising up to 96 residential units including affordable homes.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: BLR/BID/38
properties.site-address: Brunswick, Queens and Clarance Wharves, Barnstaple Street, Bideford
properties.notes: Residential potential of site considered through SHLAA SHA/BID/38. The site is identifies this site as a Bideford Regeneration Site (BID07) for a mix of housing, leisure and retail uses and listed as a Non Strategic Housing Site in the North Devon and Torridge Local Plan 2011-2031. Site subject to an endorsed Site Development Brief. Site historically subject to planning permission (1/0578/2014/FULM) for mixed use development comprising of 52 residential units, approximately 763 sq metres of retail / commercial development, open space, car parking, marina (including managers accommodation) and associated development; now lapsed. Site subject to pending application (1/1126/2020/FULM) for demolition of existing site buildings and mixed use redevelopment providing residential units, commercial units (Class E) with public open space, car parking, floating pontoon and associated landscaping work. Site identified as being deliverable in last published statement of five year housing land supply (November 2019).. Residential units
properties.ownership-status: owned by a public authority
